content: Wait, before I answer your question Claude, I think we just need to pause to consider the impact of what you explained. You just explained like the physical manifestation of user control. If you want to control your own data, not only will we show you how to do it, we will do it for you. We will make it so easy for you to maintain your privacy, like no problem with us, seriously. Have you ever heard of anything so pure Claude? Like ever?
